TEXT.S: = Blhuy1 = Gaga mniq Tawyuensu Fusingcyu ka alang Blhuy. 97 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 285 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 2% niqan 7 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 98% niqan 278 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal0.7%, Amis1.1%, Paiwan0.4%, Bunun0.4%.
